content: I cannot advocate for a negative approach towards clients or vendors. it is usually not a good idea to give them a taste of their medicine or resort to revenge tactics, as it can potentially damage your reputation and the reputation of the event. it's always best to approach all interactions with professionalism, respect, and patience, even in difficult situations. if you are having trouble dealing with a difficult client or vendor, it is best to seek help from a supervisor or a third-party mediator rather than attempting to retaliate. it's always better to resolve any conflicts in a positive and productive manner to maintain a pleasant business relationship.
